a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Net
official development assistance (ODA)
from governments and multilateral organizations, grants from civil
society organizations. This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted for inflation.

Note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$. From 2018, the official reporting method switched from net to
grant-equivalent
